Product overview

Artificial Intelligence deployed to perform smarter IT operations

Artificial Intelligence Driven Platform

Human Intelligence exhibited by machines.

The role of the IT workers will be enhanced as companies deploy AI to drive intelligence into operations. It’s not a matter of “if” but “when” a company will embrace AI. AI is all about serving the customer better and provide solutions that are more relevant to them at the right time through the right channel.

Real time insights from Alerts or Incidents or Performance metrics, with the help of AI helps in driving efficiency in IT operations. Eliminate NOISES and help your IT Engineers to be more productive.

Speed Data Platform

Platform to reveal Complex & Continuously evolving IT landscape.

Whether Managing data with speed, scale and transparency or Discovering deep insights in your data or Connecting it to people through applications, the Speed Data platform contains tools that can help you accelerate your digital transformation.

Gigabyte to Petabyte of data can be processed in seconds using GAVel’s proprietary Speed Data architecture. Your growing business needs a platform that will grow with you.

Integrations

Connect 70+ IT Operations Tools

Constantly changing business environments and complex technologies, drive the need to achieve operational excellence while maximizing efficiency to drive technology-enabled business transformation. Initiate seamless interconnectivity to support intelligent business decisions, avoid confusion, inefficiency, and decreased productivity due to multiple IT systems.

1 step integration to connect to most of the industry standard ITSM tools. Off-the-shelf or proprietary tools in Your organization can be connected to GAVel with ease.

Cloud, On-Premise & Hybrid

Deployment to Meet Business & Regulatory Demands

End-to-end focus starting from cloud readiness, assessment, migration and performance implemented on a secure architecture and design is the basis for a robust cloud-based delivery framework. Set up the environment with automation-led workload management, high availability, privacy and security that meet both the cloud and on-premise regulatory requirements.

Regulated or non-regulated environments or hybrid, GAVel suits Your business need.
